Name: Bean
Description:
The Division of Bean covers an area in the south of the ACT consisting of the Districts of:

  • Booth,
  • Coree,
  • Cotter River,
  • Mount Clear,
  • Paddys River,
  • Rendezvous Creek,
  • Stromlo,
  • Tennent,
  • Tuggeranong,
  • part of Jerrabomberra,
  • part of Molonglo Valley,
  • part of Weston Creek, and
  • part of Woden Valley

The Division of Bean also includes Norfolk Island.
ProductsAndIndustry: Mainly residential with tourism, retail and some light industry at Hume
NameDerivation: Named after Charles Edwin Woodrow Bean, 1879-1968, Australia's official correspondent to the Australian Imperial Force in World War One, editor of the Official History of Australia in the War of 1914-1918 and primary advocate to establish the Australian War Memorial.
Members: The first member for Bean will be elected at the next federal general election
DemographicRating: Inner Metropolitan - situated in capital cities and consisting of well-established built-up suburbs
